Message: The user completes the submission of the form
My credit card is declined. Called worldline to solve it, but I can not make payments now

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with your credit card. If your card payment failed and you have already contacted your bank, I recommend trying to add a different payment method to your account. Once you update your account with a new payment method, don't forget to resubmit your ads! Another short-term solution is to add ad credits to your account. For more details, you can check out our Billing Guide here: https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide

If you don't have another card, you can consider adding ad credits to your account via a bank transfer. This way, you can still fund your account and run your ads. For more details on how to add ad credits, please refer to this guide: https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit
I can't add credit until balance is paid

I understand the situation. Since you can't add credits until the balance is paid, I recommend contacting our support team directly to discuss your options. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your issue, and they will assist you further. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
